column4: Hello, I deleted the root user account and I would like to add it back. I've booted off a live cd and am about to do it. Any pointers, recommendations?
seriously doubt you actually DELETED root.  Don't think ubuntu would even boot otherwise.  is it possible you only disabled it???
I just fixed it, and yes you can delete the root account and it will still work perfectly fine except you can't do any admin stuff.
That's what happens when you're really tired and you get paranoid about security ;-)
